name: A. One and Two
statement:
You are given a sequence a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n. Each element of a is 1 or 2.Find out if an integer k exists
so that the following conditions are met. 1
leq k
leq n-1, and a_1
cdot a_2
cdot
ldots
cdot a_k = a_{k+1}
cdot a_{k+2}
cdot
ldots
cdot a_n. If there exist multiple k that satisfy the given condition,
print the smallest.
